column4: out of curiousity does Ubuntu include both hotplug and discover? seems like many are having probs running alsa because the oss stuff gets loaded also altho a simple addition to blacklist, discover.conf can resolve the issue easily...any ideas?
yeah i have that exact problem
every debian based distro, alsa has not worked till i blacklisted the oss drivers
easy fix to it...plus a visit to www.alsa-project.org could help with any other probs ;)
